trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of resource provider factory for design time.

The DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute class allows a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory> object to specify the type of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory> object.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory> class is used to create design-time providers for reading and writing resources.
Within [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], a developer can use the **Generate Local Resource** command on the **Tools** menu to create resources during design time.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute"></xref> class with the attribute set to the specified factory type name.
The name of the resource provider factory type.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute"></xref> class with the attribute set to the qualified name of the specified factory type.

The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute.FactoryTypeName%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> property value of the `factoryType` parameter.
The type of the resource provider factory.
Gets the value of the factory type name.
A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the factory type.
Determines whether the default provider is used.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute.FactoryTypeName*> equals <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
